mapper.select: select * from Article order by createTime desc limit 10

select a.articleId, a.title, a.content, u.userName as authorUserName, u.nickName as authorNickName, a.allowComment, a.hidden, a.lastModifyTime from Article a left join UserInfo u on u.userId = a.authorUserId
and a.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and a.content like concat('%', #{content}, '%')
order by a.createTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into Article(articleId, title, subTitle, content, authorUserId, allowComment, hidden, createTime, lastModifyTime) values(#{articleId}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{content}, #{authorUserId}, #{allowComment}, #{hidden}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifyTime})
